sen.j: 団地（だんち）は、人間や産業もしくは各種事物が必要とする都市基盤を支える各種インフラストラクチャーや物流の効率化を図るために、同一傾向にある目的や用途、産業などを集中させた一団の区画や地域の名称、若しくは立地している建物や建造物を指す総称の事である。
sen.e: Danchi is the name of an area in which institutions with similar objectives, purposes or industries are concentrated in order to optimize the urban infrastructure and distribution necessary for people, industry or other operations, or a generic term for an area in which buildings and structures stand.

Danchi is the name of an area in which institutions with similar objectives, purposes or industries are concentrated in order to optimize the urban infrastructure and distribution necessary for people, industry or other operations, or a generic term for an area in which buildings and structures stand.

Danchi is the name of an area in which institutions with similar objectives, purposes or industries are concentrated in order to optimize the urban infrastructure and distribution necessary for people, industry or other operations, or a generic term for an area in which buildings and structures stand.

sen.j: 団地の語源は、「一団の土地」若しくは「一団の地域」。
sen.e: The word danchi derives from the phrases "ichidan no tochi" or "ichidan no chiiki".
The word danchi derives from the phrases "ichidan no tochi" or "ichidan no chiiki".
The word danchi derives from the phrases "ichidan no tochi" or "ichidan no chiiki."

sen.j: 日本国内における法律上の意味としては、都市計画上工業地域・住宅地などを新たに計画して建設されたものを指す。
sen.e: According to the Japanese legal definition, the word refers to industrial and residential estates that are newly planned and constructed as an aspect of urban planning.
According to the Japanese legal definition, the word refers to industrial and residential estates that are newly planned and constructed as an aspect of urban planning.
According to the Japanese legal definition, the word refers to industrial and residential estates that are newly planned and constructed as an aspect of urban planning.

sen.j: 一般的には住宅の集合体を指し、工業団地のように製造業等の事業所の集合体を指す場合もある。
sen.e: The term generally refers to a cluster of residential buildings but may also refer to a collection of facilities for manufacturing and related activities exemplified by "kogyo danchi".
The term generally refers to a cluster of residential buildings but may also refer to a collection of facilities for manufacturing and related activities exemplified by "kogyo danchi".
The term generally refers to a cluster of residential buildings but may also refer to a collection of facilities for manufacturing and related activities exemplified by "kogyo danchi・"

sen.j: 但し、一つの敷地内に複数の工場棟が存在する場合に工業団地とは呼ぶことは稀である。
sen.e: However, it is rare that sites containing multiple factory buildings are referred to as "kogyo danchi".
However, it is rare that sites containing multiple factory buildings are referred to as "kogyo danchi".
However, it is rare that sites containing multiple factory buildings are referred to as "kogyo danchi."

sen.j: 都市基盤におけるインフラ整備は大きく分けると、長々期的な計画の元に国家や地方公共団体が政策主導で行なう数十年単位のものと、5 -10年程度の間隔において比較的短期間に目標を達成して収益や効果を期待するものがある。
sen.e: Broadly speaking, urban infrastructure improvement consists of those projects that are carried out by the state or local government based on long-term plans over tens of years, and those that aim to be completed and become profitable within a relatively short period of 5-10 years.

Broadly speaking, urban infrastructure improvement consists of those projects that are carried out by the state or local government based on long-term plans over tens of years, and those that aim to be completed and become profitable within a relatively short period of 5-10 years.

Broadly speaking, urban infrastructure improvement includes projects carried out by the state or local government based on long-term plans over tens of years, and those aiming to be completed and become profitable within a relatively short period of 5-10 years.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: どちらの場合もインフラ整備には少なからぬ時間と費用を要し、団地建設のためには団地建設を費用面から支える一定規模以上の事業者や入居者が必要となり、団地建設にかかる建設費用との対比によって採算性が問われ、事業決定される。
sen.e: In either case, infrastructure improvement requires a considerable amount of time and money, and a large business and many tenants are necessary in order for a danchi to be constructed, while a comparison with the costs involved mean that profitability must be investigated before deciding whether or not to proceed.

In either case, infrastructure improvement requires a considerable amount of time and money, and a large business and many tenants are necessary in order for a danchi to be constructed, while a comparison with the costs involved mean that profitability must be investigated before deciding whether or not to proceed.

Both types of projects require a considerable amount of time and money, and a large enough business and number of tenants are necessary in order for a danchi to be constructed; a comparison of the costs involved means that profitability must be investigated before a decision is taken as to whether to proceed.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: いわゆる団地では、地域としての需要と採算に見合った供給のバランスシートにより計画が決定されることが多い。
sen.e: Many plans for the construction of danchi are decided based on a balance sheet with a supply that corresponds to demand and profit.
Many plans for the construction of danchi are decided based on a balance sheet with a supply that corresponds to demand and profit.
Many plans for the construction of danchi are decided based on a balance sheet with a supply that corresponds to demand and profit.

sen.j: 具体的には団地内で用いる道路・上下水道・電力等のインフラを何もないところから敷設する費用は受益者の多寡によらず一定の費用がかかり先行投資が必要となる。
sen.e: The expenses necessary for construction of the infrastructure elements within a danchi such as roads, water and sewerage and electricity where previously none of these existed demands a certain level of prior investment regardless of the number of beneficiaries.

The expenses necessary for construction of the infrastructure elements within a danchi such as roads, water and sewerage and electricity where previously none of these existed demands a certain level of prior investment regardless of the number of beneficiaries.

The expenses necessary for construction of the infrastructure elements within a danchi such as roads, water and sewerage and electricity where previously none of these existed demands a certain level of prior investment regardless of the number of beneficiaries.

sen.j: 受益者の数が少ない場合は受益者負担が増え、受益者負担を減らした場合は費用回収が困難となる。
sen.e: Where there are few beneficiaries, the burden on each beneficiary will be greater, and it may become difficult to recover costs in the event that the number of beneficiaries decreases.
Where there are few beneficiaries, the burden on each beneficiary will be greater, and it may become difficult to recover costs in the event that the number of beneficiaries decreases.
Where there are few beneficiaries, the burden on each beneficiary will be greater, and it may become difficult to recover costs in the event that the burden is alleviated.
sen.cmt: 後半を文意に合うように書き換えました。

sen.j: このため、住宅団地では人口のスプロール化やドーナツ化現象等により人口増が生じた場合への対処として、単位面積当たりの人口密度の多寡では人口密度の低い一戸建て住宅に代表される単体の居住用建物を分散して建設するよりは、集中して建設した方がバスや電車等の公共交通機関の運行や周辺施設へのアクセス等を左右する道路整備などで高密度なサービスが可能となり、利便性の観点からも効率がよい結果が得られる。
sen.e: Danchi developments provide a solution to population increases according to urban sprawl and the doughnut phenomenon because, as opposed to sparsely spaced individual dwellings of low population density per unit area such as single houses, concentrated dwellings make it possible for public transport such as buses and trains as well as roads to service these areas, making them also convenient from an efficiency standpoint.

Danchi developments provide a solution to population increases according to urban sprawl and the doughnut phenomenon because, as opposed to sparsely spaced individual dwellings of low population density per unit area such as single houses, concentrated dwellings make it possible for public transport such as buses and trains as well as roads to service these areas, making them also convenient from an efficiency standpoint.

Danchi developments provide a solution to population increases caused by several reasons including urban sprawl and doughnut phenomena because, as opposed to sparsely spaced individual dwellings of low population density per unit area such as single houses, concentrated dwellings provide more efficient public transport system as buses and trains and more effective road maintenance and improvement service to these areas; thus danchi development leads to better consequences in terms of convenience.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 更に高効率化する場合には重層構造の居住用建物を計画して対処する。
sen.e: Efficiency can be further increased by the construction of multistorey residential buildings.
Efficiency can be further increased by the construction of multistorey residential buildings.
Efficiency can be further increased by the construction of multistorey residential buildings.

sen.j: 他方、工業団地では工場から発生する音や振動等を周辺地域に及ぼしたり周辺環境を乱さないように住環境と離れた位置に集中して建設されることが多い。
sen.e: On the other hand, industrial danchi are often constructed in locations distant from residential areas so that the noise and vibrations generated by factories does not disturb inhabitants or disrupt the environment.

On the other hand, industrial danchi are often constructed in locations distant from residential areas so that the noise and vibrations generated by factories does not disturb inhabitants or disrupt the environment.

On the other hand, industrial danchi are often constructed distant from residential areas so that the noise and vibrations generated by factories do not disturb inhabitants or disrupt the environment.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 加えて工業団地では物流関連の観点から原材料や製品を効率的に運般可能とするために高速道路や主要幹線道路に近い立地条件に開発される場合が多い。
sen.e: In addition, the aspect of distribution means that many industrial danchi are situated near to highways or major roads in order to make it possible to efficiently transport raw materials and products.

In addition, the aspect of distribution means that many industrial danchi are situated near to highways or major roads in order to make it possible to efficiently transport raw materials and products.
In addition, many industrial danchi are constructed near highways or major roads in order to make it possible to transport raw materials and products efficiently.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。余分なスペースを削除しました。

sen.j: 農業団地では農産物を集荷し加工運般するための工場等が必要となる場合もある。
sen.e: Agricultural danchi may also require installations such as factories so that agricultural products can be collected, and processed.
Agricultural danchi may also require installations such as factories so that agricultural products can be collected, and processed.
Agricultural danchi may also require installations such as factories so that agricultural products can be collected, processed, or transported.

sen.j: 住宅団地の場合、日本では日本住宅公団（現・都市再生機構）や地方公共団体が建築したものを指す場合が多い。
sen.e: Residential danchi are very often constructed by the Japan Housing Corporation (now the Urban Renaissance Agency) or local governments.
Residential danchi are very often constructed by the Japan Housing Corporation (now the Urban Renaissance Agency) or local governments.
Residential danchi are very often constructed by the Japan Housing Corporation (now the Urban Renaissance Agency) or local governments.

sen.j: また、企業が社宅として建設したもの（特に旧・日本電信電話公社）もある。
sen.e: There are also danchi that are constructed by companies to serve as employee housing (particularly by the former Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Public Corporation).
There are also danchi that are constructed by companies to serve as employee housing (particularly by the former Nippon Telegraph and Telephone Public Corporation).

sen.j: 鉄筋コンクリート造の集合住宅が建ち並んでいる姿が一般的であるが、一戸建ての住宅が建ち並んでいる住宅地でも「○○団地」と名乗っていることがある。
sen.e: Danchi generally consist of reinforced concrete apartment buildings but there are also areas consisting of separate dwellings but for which the name contains the word "danchi".

sen.j: 棟の形態としては、高層住宅のものや、5階建て程度の直方体の階段室型、2階建てのテラスハウス、星型のスターハウスがある。
sen.e: Housing is provided in high-rise buildings, five-storey cuboid buildings with stairwells, two-storey terraced houses, and star shaped buildings.

Housing includes high rise dwellings, five-story cuboid staircase type of dwellings, two-story terraced houses, and star-shaped star houses.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 一般に、大規模なものが大都市の近郊や高速道路・鉄道路線などに設けられることが多い。
sen.e: Large danchi are generally located on the outskirts of major cities or near to highways and railways.
Large danchi are generally located on the outskirts of major cities or near to highways and railways.
Large danchi are generally located on the outskirts of major cities or near to highways and railways.

sen.j: また、大都市中心部などに置かれた大規模工場を住宅地に変更する際にもこの手法が採り入れられる事がある。
sen.e: Such developments are also used when converting large factories in city centers into residential areas.
Such developments are also used when converting large factories in city centers into residential areas.
Such developments are also used when converting large factories in city centers into residential areas.

sen.j: 建設の際には目的に合致したライフラインの整備も合わせて行われる。
sen.e: During construction, infrastructure improvements are also conducted to be compatible with the completed development.
During construction, infrastructure improvements are also conducted to be compatible with the completed development.
During construction, improvements are also made to the local infrastructure to ensure that it is compatible with the completed development.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 都市再開発は既存の市街地で権利変換を行うもので、地域住民との合意形成に時間を要するが、未だ市街化されていない地域で行われるニュータウン建設などの場合は、農地などの大規模な土地を比較的低価格で得ることが可能であり、かつ効率的に都市計画決定などの手続きを進めることも可能である。
sen.e: Urban redevelopment is conducted by exchange of rights in an existing urban area, so time is required to gain the agreement of local residents but when new towns are constructed in as yet non-built up areas, it is possible to acquire large areas of land such as a agricultural land for a relatively low price as well as efficiently carry out the procedures relating to urban planning decisions.

Urban redevelopment is conducted by exchange of rights in an existing urban area, so time is required to gain the agreement of local residents but when new towns are constructed in as yet non-built up areas, it is possible to acquire large areas of land such as a agricultural land for a relatively low price as well as efficiently carry out the procedures relating to urban planning decisions.

Since urban redevelopment is conducted by exchange of rights in an existing urban area, it requires some time for consensus building with local residents; however, when a new towns is constructed in areas that has not been urbanized yet, it is possible to acquire large area of land, such as land used for agriculture, for a relatively low price and to carry out effectively necessary procedures including urban planning decisions.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。余分なスペースを削除しました。

sen.j: 各住宅の敷地境界に設える塀としての垣根を取り払う、若しくは生垣の植栽を低いものにする、等々の物理的な開放性を高くし、隣接する互いの敷地を視覚的に一体化した形式。
sen.e: Hedges marking the boundary of each property are removed or short hedges are used, the sense of physical openness is increased, there are no distinct visible boundaries between properties.
Hedges marking the boundary of each property are removed or short hedges are used, the sense of physical openness is increased, there are no distinct visible boundaries between properties.

sen.j: 1950年代半ばに建設が始まった公団住宅は、水洗トイレ、風呂、ダイニングキッチン、ベランダなどを取り入れ、近代的なものとして憧れの住宅だった。

sen.j: 1960年代〜1970年代頃に建設された団地は5階建てまでになっているのが多く、エレベーターが設置されていないものが多い（集合住宅では、5階までであればエレベーターの設置が義務づけられておらず、6階以上でエレベーターを設置する義務がある。
sen.e: Many of the danchi constructed from the 1960s to 1970s consisted of five-storey buildings but it was common that elevators were not installed (there was no obligation to install elevators in residential buildings of up to five storeys but was required if the building had six-storeys.

(It was not obligated to install elevators in residential buildings of up to five stories but was obligated to install one when it was a six-story building or taller.)
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 設置されていてもカゴのサイズがあまり大きくないこともあり、引越しなどで家具を搬出入する際の弊害になることがある）。
sen.e: Even when elevators were installed, they were small and could not accommodate furniture, which was incredibly inconvenient when residents moved in or out).
Even when elevators were installed, they were small and could not accommodate furniture, which was incredibly inconvenient when residents moved in or out.
Even when elevators were installed, they were small and could not accommodate furniture, which was incredibly inconvenient when residents moved in or out.

sen.j: これらは老朽化の時期を迎え、住民も高齢化しているため、バリアフリーや引越し時における負担の観点から大きな課題を抱えている。
sen.e: These buildings as well as their residents began to age, causing major issues from the standpoints of accessibility and burden when moving in and out.
These buildings as well as their residents began to age, causing major issues from the standpoints of accessibility and burden when moving in and out.
Since both these buildings and their residents have become old, there are a lot of problems including barrier-free and heavy in moving.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。余分なスペースを削除しました。

sen.j: 容積率に余裕を持って建てられているものが多いので、住宅需要の高い地域であれば、高層化を行って戸数を増やし、増えた分の住戸を売却して建設資金をまかなう、という手法も可能であるが、住宅需要が乏しい地域で採算の見込めない団地、あるいは既に容積率いっぱいに建てている団地の場合は建て替えが困難になっている例もある。
sen.e: The are many buildings that were constructed with surplus space, so if an area has a particularly large housing demand it is possible to add additional storeys, construct additional buildings and sell these dwellings in order to cover construction funds but there are also danchi where rebuilding is problematic due to no prospect of profitability as a result of low housing demand or where there is no space remaining.

The are many buildings that were constructed with surplus space, so if an area has a particularly large housing demand it is possible to add additional storeys, construct additional buildings and sell these dwellings in order to cover construction funds but there are also danchi where rebuilding is problematic due to no prospect of profitability as a result of low housing demand or where there is no space remaining.

There are many buildings constructed with surplus space, so if particularly large housing demand occurs in one area, it is possible to cover construction funds by building additional storys and selling them; however, for some danchi, rebuilding is problematic partly because housing demand is very limited with little prospect of profitability and partly because that danchi has used full floor-area ratio and there is no space remaining
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 現在は、電車やモノレールなどの交通機関が発展したこともあり、商業中心地より少し離れて各種環境の良い場所へ、団地の建設が行われている。
sen.e: Danchi are now being constructed complete with transportation facilities such as monorails, and located in pleasant areas a short distance from commercial centers.
Danchi are now being constructed complete with transportation facilities such as monorails, and located in pleasant areas a short distance from commercial centers.
Danchi are now being constructed in areas with good environments and a little distant from commercial centers due to the development of transportation facilities such as monorails.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。余分なピリオドを削除しました。

sen.j: 高層化され、公園や病院、また大型ショッピングセンターが併設されるなど、多くの人にとって良い選択地となっている。
sen.e: The addition of extra storeys as well as the establishment of parks, hospitals and large shopping centers means that these areas are becoming an attractive option for many people.
The addition of extra storeys as well as the establishment of parks, hospitals and large shopping centers means that these areas are becoming an attractive option for many people.
Danchi has become taller and parks, hostpials and large shopping centers have been built near danchi, so that danchi has become an attractive option for many people.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 老朽化の進む団地では次のいずれかの方法で更新を行う。
sen.e: Aging danchi are renovated by the following methods.
Aging danchi are renovated by the following methods.
Aging danchi are renovated by the following methods.

sen.j: - 従来型の直方体の建物を最新式の高層住宅に改築する。
sen.e: The previous cuboid buildings are reconstructed as new high-rise dwellings.
The previous cuboid buildings are reconstructed as new high-rise dwellings.
The previous cuboid buildings are reconstructed as new high-rise dwellings.

sen.j: - 老朽化した外装・内装を更新するほか、バリアフリー対策としてエレベーターと廊下を増築する工事も行われている。
sen.e: In addition to the restoration of aging exteriors and interiors, elevators are installed and corridors added in order to provide better accessibility for the physically disadvantaged or disabled.
In addition to the restoration of aging exteriors and interiors, elevators are installed and corridors added in order to provide better accessibility for the physically disadvantaged or disabled.
In addition to the restoration of aging exteriors and interiors, elevators are installed and corridors added in order to provide better accessibility for the physically disadvantaged or disabled.

sen.j: 最近は一部の自治体で、特殊な塗料を使用したコンクリートの改良を行うケースもある。
sen.e: Recently, some regional governments have carried out improvements using concrete covered by a special paint.
Recently, some regional governments have carried out improvements using concrete covered by a special paint.
Recently, some autonomous community have improved concrete covered with special paint.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 団地族マンション族のはしり。
sen.e: Danchi-zoku (danchi dwellers): Derived from the word "manshon-zoku" (apartment dwellers).
Danchi-zoku (danchi dwellers): Derived from the word "manshon-zoku" (apartment dwellers).
The beginning of Danchi-zoku (danchi dwellers) / Manshon-zoku (apartment dwellers).
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。スペース補足しました。不要な"を削除しました。

sen.j: 日本住宅公団が1955年に設立され、鉄筋コンクリート造の集合住宅を供給した。
sen.e: The Japan Housing Corporation was established in 1955 and worked to provide reinforced concrete housing complexes.
The Japan Housing Corporation was established in 1955 and worked to provide reinforced concrete housing complexes.
The Japan Housing Corporation was established in 1955 and worked to provide reinforced concrete housing complexes.

sen.j: ダイニングキッチンに椅子・テーブルなどが、当時の洋風化へのあこがれとともに受け入れられ、羨望を含めた呼び名として用いられた。
sen.e: This word was coined and used as a term of envy as the desire for the shift to western style housing was catered for by these buildings with features such as eat-in kitchens with tables and chairs.
This word was coined and used as a term of envy as the desire for the shift to western style housing was catered for by these buildings with features such as eat-in kitchens with tables and chairs.
This word was coined and used as a term of envy as the desire for the shift to western style housing was catered for by these buildings with features such as eat-in kitchens with tables and chairs.

sen.j: 「団地族」と呼んだ最初の報道記事は『週刊朝日』1958.7.20号。
sen.e: The first media report to use the word "danchi-zoku" appeared in the 2nd July 1958 edition of the "Shukan Asahi".
The first media report to use the word "danchi-zoku" appeared in the July 2nd 1958 edition of the "Shukan Asahi".
The first media report to use the word "danchi-zoku" appeared in the July 20, 1958 edition of the "Shukan Asahi."

sen.j: 団地妻有閑マダムの一種。
sen.e: Danchi-zuma: A lady of leisure.
Danchi-zuma: A lady of leisure.
Danchi-zuma: A lady of leisure.

sen.j: 各住戸が鉄扉（玄関ドア）一枚で仕切られるようになり、隣戸間（りんこかん）の相互干渉が減少し、発生したとされる。
sen.e: Believed to have arisen as it became common that each house was separated by an iron front door and interaction with neighbors decreased.
Believed to have arisen as it became common that each house was separated by an iron front door and interaction with neighbors decreased.
This type is believed to have arisen since each house was separated by an iron door (front door) and interactions with neighbors decreased.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 複数の映画シリーズ、小説が生まれた。
sen.e: Was coined by numerous films and novels.
Was coined by numerous films and novels.
Numerous film series and novels about Danchi lives were produced.
sen.cmt: FBに基づき修正しました。

sen.j: 団地萌え：工場萌えなどと同様、団地そのものを趣味の対象にすることを呼ぶ。
sen.e: Danchi-moe (danchi love): Similar to "kojo-moe" (factory love), this word refers to people who have a deep fascination with danchi.
Danchi-moe (danchi love): Similar to "kojo-moe" (factory love), this word refers to people who have a deep fascination with danchi.
Danchi-moe (danchi love): Similar to "kojo-moe" (factory love), this word refers to people who have a deep fascination with danchi.

sen.j: 現在、様々な団地の写真を集めた写真集やWebサイトなどが複数作られている。
sen.e: There are now numerous photo books and websites containing various photos of danchi.
There are now numerous photo books and websites containing various photos of danchi.
